introduction: With a range of built-in and extensible Modes, ModelHarbor Agent lets you plan, architect, code, debug and boost your productivity like never before.
notice: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.
chooseProvider: To do its magic, ModelHarbor needs an API key.
startRouter: We recommend using an LLM Router:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:
modelHarbor: You can obtain API key from ModelHarbor.com

telemetry.title: Help Improve ModelHarbor Agent
telemetry.anonymousTelemetry: Send anonymous error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. No code, prompts, or personal information is ever sent.
telemetry.changeSettings: You can always change this at the bottom of the <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>
